text:
To my waitsoo.
I love you so much.
You are the light of my life.
My sugar, spice, and everything nice.
I love basically everything you make.
You're so cautious and kind with our son.
You're gorgeous without even needing to try.
I love the videos of our son playing in the park.
I love seeing you pose with the cats when you take a picture.
I love seeing you smile when you wake up in the morning.
I love you rachel, now and forever yours -- Austin.
